n, X = map(int,input().split())
prices = list(map(int,input().split()))
prices.sort()

i = 0
j = n-1

count = 0
while i < j:
    if prices[i] + prices[j] > X:
        j -= 1
        count += 1
    else:
        i += 1
        j -= 1
        count += 2

if i == j:
    count += 1

print(count)

import sys

n, X = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
prices = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

prices.sort()

#print(n, X)
#print(prices)

i = 0
j = n - 1

count = 0

while i < j:
    if prices[i] + prices[j] > X:
        count += 2
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    else:
        if prices[i] + prices[i + 1] > X:
            count += 1
            i += 1
        if prices[j] + prices[j - 1] > X:
            count += 1
            j -= 1
        if prices[i] + prices[i + 1] <= X and prices[j] + prices[j - 1] <= X:
            break

print(count)
